messages.message: Hey folks, if you write docs in Markdown in VSCode, thereâ€™s a linter that can help you avoid common issues and make sure your Markdown is well-formed: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=DavidAnson.vscode-markdownlint
